item.title: Maintaining packages and backporting
item.description: A few days ago I committed a small update to policycoreutils, a SELinux related package that provides most of the management utilities for SELinux systems. The fix was to get two patches (which are committed upstream) into the existing release so that our users can benefit from the fixed issues without having to wait for a new release.
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
